roleset.name: convert liquid to solid via an electric current

role.descr: instruement or manner, if seperate from arg 0

roleset.note: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to coagulate.01. Coagulate.01 is a member of Vncls other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie.

example.name: goal for beneficiary
example.text: After I had my electrocoagulation of the cervix, I was in pain for hours.
